bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Pole-Mounted Equipment--Enclosure Integrity for Coastal Environments
IEEE Standard for Pole-Mounted Equipment--Enclosure Integrity for Coastal Environments

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Conformance tests and requirements for the coating integrity of pole-mounted enclosures for application in coastal environments containing apparatus energized in excess of 600 V, typically located out of reach of the general public, including, but not limited to, the following types of equipment enclosures: pole-mounted distribution transformers, pole-mounted switches, pole-mounted regulators, pole-mounted metering equipment, pole-mounted reclosers, and pole-mounted switchgear, are discussed.

Conformance tests and requirements for the coating integrity of pole-mounted enclosures for application in coastal environments containing apparatus energized in excess of 600 V, typically located out of reach of the general public, including, but not limited to, the following types of equipment enclosures: pole-mounted distribution transformers, pole-mounted switches, pole-mounted regulators, pole-mounted metering equipment, pole-mounted reclosers, and pole-mounted switchgear, are discussed.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
